name: Backend Shorts Specialization
description: Specialized program on backend fundamentals, covering APIs, databases, and system design with real-world projects.

name: Intermediate SQL
description: Hands-on course focused on advanced SQL queries, joins, subqueries, and aggregate functions.

name: Intermediate Git
description: Covered branching strategies, rebasing, stashing, and collaborative Git workflows.

name: Introduction to Git
description: Introduction to version control concepts including commits, branches, and remote repositories.

name: Introduction to GitHub Concepts
description: Fundamentals of GitHub usage including repositories, pull requests, issues, and collaboration workflows.

name: Introduction to Shell
description: Basics of shell scripting, command-line operations, and navigation using Bash.
